dict.string: Duplicati needs access to your Photos Library to back up your images.
Duplicati needs access to your Downloads folder to include files in your backups.
Duplicati needs access to your Documents folder to include files in your backups.
Duplicati needs access to your Desktop folder to include files in your backups.
Duplicati needs access to external drives for backup and restore operations.
Duplicati needs access to network drives for backup and restore operations.
Duplicati may run scripts that need to control other apps using AppleScript for automation purposes.
Duplicati may require administrative privileges for system-wide backups and operations.
